Navigation
Name Recipes/Visualization
Synopsis Recipes for creating visualizations.
Details MyFirstBox PlayingWithProperties ADT DrawLogo InteractiveBoxHeight ParseTree
Description We cover the following topics:
  • MyFirstBox: Drawing a box in many variations.
  • PlayingWithProperties: Illustrate the effect of various figure properties.
  • ADT: Visualize an Algebraic Datatype as a tree.
  • DrawLogo: Draw the Rascal logo.
  • InteractiveBoxHeight: Control the height of a box with user input.
  • ParseTree: Visualize a parse tree.
